text: The 1993 San Marino Grand Prix (known as the 13° Gran Premio di San Marino by the people putting on the race) was a Formula One motor race held on 25 April 1993 at the Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari in Imola, Italy. It was the third race of the 1993 Formula One season. ==Classification== ===Qualifying=== Pos No Driver Constructor Q1 Q2 Gap 1 2 Alain Prost Williams-Renault 1:22.788 1:22.070 — 2 0 Damon Hill
